content:
So I think we're in a good spot and now really the job for Michael and I is to get this business on a profitable standing right now in this current quarter and moving forward and that's what Michael and I are focused on
 And in closing, I just an observation, the revenue stream of the past quarter and what you've got the momentum you've got going here in this existing quarter you're going to be reaching toward hopefully being able to deliver a $100 million in revenue stream on a annual basis going forward as you build out.
